declarations.description:
A container for grouping `nys-accordionitem` components with coordinated expand/collapse behavior.

Place `nys-accordionitem` elements as children. Set `singleSelect` to allow only one item open at a time.
The `bordered` style propagates to all children automatically.
declarations.name: NysAccordion

slots.description: Default slot for `nys-accordionitem` elements.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: singleSelect
members.description: Only one item can be expanded at a time. Expanding one collapses others.

members.name: bordered
members.description: Adds borders around each accordion item. Propagates to all children.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: singleSelect
attributes.description: Only one item can be expanded at a time. Expanding one collapses others.

attributes.name: bordered
attributes.description: Adds borders around each accordion item. Propagates to all children.

declarations.summary: Container for accordion items with optional single-select and bordered styling.

declarations.description:
A collapsible content panel used within `nys-accordion`. Supports keyboard navigation and smooth animations.

Place inside `nys-accordion`. Set `expanded` to open by default. The heading acts as a toggle button
accessible via click, Enter, or Space. Parent accordion controls `bordered` and `singleSelect` behavior.
declarations.name: NysAccordionItem

slots.description: Default slot for panel content shown when expanded.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: heading
members.description: Heading text displayed in the clickable toggle button.

members.name: expanded
members.description: Whether the content panel is visible. Toggle via click or keyboard.

members.name: bordered
members.description: Adds border styling. Set by parent `nys-accordion`, not directly.

events.name: nys-accordionitem-toggle
events.description: Fired when expanded state changes. Detail: `{id, heading, expanded}`.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Heading text displayed in the clickable toggle button.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Whether the content panel is visible. Toggle via click or keyboard.

attributes.name: bordered
attributes.description: Adds border styling. Set by parent `nys-accordion`, not directly.

declarations.summary: Collapsible panel for use within nys-accordion with keyboard support.

declarations.description:
Displays contextual feedback messages with semantic styling. Uses ARIA live regions for screen reader announcements.

Use `info` for neutral information, `success` for confirmations, `warning` for caution, `danger` for errors,
and `emergency` for critical system-wide alerts. Set `dismissible` to let users close the alert.
declarations.name: NysAlert

slots.description: Default slot for custom body content. Overrides `text` prop when provided.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: heading
members.description: Bold heading text displayed at the top of the alert.

members.name: icon
members.description: Custom icon name. Defaults to type-appropriate icon if not set.

members.name: dismissible
members.description: Shows close button allowing users to dismiss the alert.

members.name: duration
members.description: Auto-dismiss after specified milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable.

members.name: text
members.description: Body text content. Ignored if slot content is provided.

members.name: primaryAction
members.description: URL for the primary action link.

members.name: secondaryAction
members.description: URL for the secondary action link.

members.name: primaryLabel
members.description: Label text for primary action link.

members.name: secondaryLabel
members.description: Label text for secondary action link.

members.name: type
members.description: Semantic alert type affecting color and ARIA role. `danger`/`emergency` use assertive live region.

members.name: ariaAttributes
members.description:
Returns ARIA role and label based on alert type.
- 'alert' => assertive live region (implied)
- 'status' => polite live region
- 'region' => generic, requires aria-label

members.name: liveRegion
members.description:
Returns live-region type for screen readers if applicable.
- 'polite' for status role
- undefined for alert (since it's implicitly assertive) or region

members.name: _checkSlotContent
members.description:
Checks whether the default slot has content.
Updates `_slotHasContent` accordingly.

events.name: nys-close
events.description: Fired when alert is dismissed. Detail: `{id, type, label}`.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Bold heading text displayed at the top of the alert.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Custom icon name. Defaults to type-appropriate icon if not set.

attributes.name: dismissible
attributes.description: Shows close button allowing users to dismiss the alert.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Auto-dismiss after specified milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Body text content. Ignored if slot content is provided.

attributes.name: primaryAction
attributes.description: URL for the primary action link.

attributes.name: secondaryAction
attributes.description: URL for the secondary action link.

attributes.name: primaryLabel
attributes.description: Label text for primary action link.

attributes.name: secondaryLabel
attributes.description: Label text for secondary action link.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Semantic alert type affecting color and ARIA role. `danger`/`emergency` use assertive live region.

declarations.summary: Alert for contextual feedback with semantic types and live region support.

declarations.name: NysAvatar

slots.description: Custom icon content. Overrides default icon when no image or initials.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.description: Accessible label for screen readers. Required when no image `alt` is available.

members.name: image
members.description: Image URL. Takes priority over initials and icon.

members.name: initials
members.description: 1-2 character initials. Used when no image is provided.

members.name: icon
members.description: Custom icon name. Falls back to `account_circle` if not set.

members.name: color
members.description: Background color. Foreground auto-adjusts for contrast. Accepts CSS values or variables.

members.name: interactive
members.description: Makes avatar clickable with button role and focus ring.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction when `interactive` is true.

members.name: lazy
members.description: Enables lazy loading for the image.

members.name: getContrastForeground
members.description:
Computes the appropriate foreground color (icon or initials)
based on the avatar's background color for sufficient contrast.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: ariaLabel
attributes.description: Accessible label for screen readers. Required when no image `alt` is available.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Image URL. Takes priority over initials and icon.

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: 1-2 character initials. Used when no image is provided.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Custom icon name. Falls back to `account_circle` if not set.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Background color. Foreground auto-adjusts for contrast. Accepts CSS values or variables.

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: Makes avatar clickable with button role and focus ring.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Prevents interaction when `interactive` is true.

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: Enables lazy loading for the image.

declarations.summary: User avatar with image, initials, or icon fallback and contrast-aware colors.

declarations.description:
A floating "Back to top" button that appears after scrolling. Smooth-scrolls to page top when clicked.

Auto-shows after scrolling 1.5 viewports on pages 4+ screens tall. Set `visible` to force display.
Renders as circle button on mobile. Position with `position` prop (`left` or `right`).
declarations.name: NysBacktotop

members.name: position
members.description: Horizontal position: `left` or `right`.

members.name: visible
members.description: Force button visibility. Overrides auto-show scroll behavior.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Horizontal position: `left` or `right`.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Force button visibility. Overrides auto-show scroll behavior.

declarations.summary: Floating back-to-top button with auto-show behavior and smooth scroll.

declarations.description:
A compact label for status, counts, or categorization. Supports semantic intents with auto-selected icons.

Use badges to highlight metadata like status ("Approved"), counts ("3 new"), or categories.
Set `intent` to apply semantic meaning. Add `prefixIcon` or `suffixIcon` as boolean for default icons,
or pass icon name strings for custom icons.
declarations.name: NysBadge

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier.

members.name: name
members.description: Name attribute for form association.

members.name: size
members.description: Badge size: `sm` (smaller text) or `md` (default).

members.name: intent
members.description: Semantic intent affecting color: `neutral`, `error`, `success`, or `warning`.

members.name: prefixLabel
members.description: Secondary label displayed before the main label.

members.name: label
members.description: Primary label text displayed in the badge.

members.name: resolveIcon

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The icon property value (string or boolean)

members.description: Resolves which icon should be rendered.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for form association.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Badge size: `sm` (smaller text) or `md` (default).

attributes.name: intent
attributes.description: Semantic intent affecting color: `neutral`, `error`, `success`, or `warning`.

attributes.name: prefixLabel
attributes.description: Secondary label displayed before the main label.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Primary label text displayed in the badge.

declarations.summary: Compact label for status, counts, or categorization with semantic styling.

declarations.description:
A button for actions like saving, submitting, or navigating. Form-associated with full keyboard support.

Use `filled` for primary actions (one per section), `outline` for secondary, `ghost` for tertiary,
`text` for inline. Set `href` to render as a navigation link.
declarations.name: NysButton

cssProperties.description: Text color of the button label.
cssProperties.name: --nys-button-color

slots.description: Icon before label. Not shown for `text` variant.
slots.name: prefix-icon

slots.description: Icon after label. Not shown for `text` variant.
slots.name: suffix-icon

slots.description: Icon for circle mode. Overrides `icon` prop.
slots.name: circle-icon

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission.

members.name: size
members.description: Button height: `sm` (40px) for dense UIs, `md` (48px, default) for standard use, `lg` (56px) for prominent CTAs.

members.name: fullWidth
members.description: Expands button to fill container width. Use for mobile layouts or stacked button groups.

members.name: variant
members.description: Visual style: `filled` for primary (one per section), `outline` for secondary, `ghost` for tertiary, `text` for inline actions. Avoid `text` for navigation.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible button text. Use sentence case, action-oriented text (e.g., "Save Draft"). Becomes aria-label in `circle` mode.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.description: Screen reader label. Required for icon-only buttons if `label` is not set.

members.name: ariaControls
members.description: ID of controlled element (e.g., dropdown or modal). Sets `aria-controls`.

members.name: prefixIcon
members.description: Material Symbol icon before label. Not shown for `text` variant or `circle` mode.

members.name: suffixIcon
members.description: Material Symbol icon after label. Use `chevron_down` for dropdowns, `open_in_new` for external links. Not shown for `text` variant or `circle` mode.

members.name: circle
members.description: Renders circular icon-only button. Requires `icon` prop. `label` becomes aria-label.

members.name: icon
members.description: Icon for circle mode. Required when `circle` is true. Scales with size (sm=24px, md=32px, lg=40px).

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction. Avoid disabling without explanationshow validation errors instead.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with. Use when button is outside the form element.

members.name: value
members.description: Value submitted with form data. Only used when `type="submit"`.

members.name: ariaDescription
members.description: Additional screen reader description. Sets `aria-description`.

members.name: type
members.description: Form behavior: `button` (default, no form action), `submit` (submits form), `reset` (resets form). Always set explicitly to avoid unintended submissions.

members.name: onClick
members.description: Click handler. Use instead of `@click` to ensure keyboard accessibility.

members.name: href
members.description: URL to navigate to. Renders as `<a>` tag. Omit for action buttons.

members.name: target
members.description: Link target: `_self` (same tab), `_blank` (new tabadd `suffixIcon="open_in_new"`), `_parent`, `_top`, or frame name.

members.name: _handleAnyAttributeFunction
members.description:
Vanilla JS & Native HTML keydown solution:
The <nys-button onClick="doFunction();"></nys-button> onClick is an attribute here.
Thus, we call it here. Otherwise, at this point, this.onClick is null as it isn't props, but a string attribute
In vanilla HTML/JS, clicking with execute the attribute function, BUT now with keydown, hence this solution.

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Fired when the button loses focus.

events.description: Fired when the button is clicked (mouse or keyboard). Not fired when disabled.

declarations.description:
A checkbox input for binary choices or multi-select lists. Can be used standalone or in a `nys-checkboxgroup`.
Form-associated with validation via ElementInternals.

Use for binary decisions (agree/disagree) or selecting multiple options from a list.
For single selection from 2-6 options, use `nys-radiobutton`. For immediate state changes, use `nys-toggle`.
declarations.name: NysCheckbox

slots.description: Custom HTML description content.
slots.name: description

members.name: checked
members.description: Whether checkbox is checked.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks as required. Validates that checkbox is checked.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission. Use same name for grouped checkboxes.

members.name: value
members.description: Value submitted when checked.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with when checkbox is outside form element.

members.name: showError
members.description: Shows error message when true.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

members.name: groupExist
members.description: Internal: Set by parent checkboxgroup. Do not set manually.

members.description: Renders as tile with larger clickable area. Apply to group for consistency.

members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

members.name: size
members.description: Checkbox size: `sm` (24px) or `md` (32px, default).

declarations.description:
A container for grouping multiple `nys-checkbox` components as a single form control.
Handles validation, required constraints, and submits comma-separated values.

Use to allow users to select multiple options from a list. Apply `tile`, `size`, and `inverted` to the group
and all children inherit these styles automatically.
declarations.name: NysCheckboxgroup

slots.description: Default slot for `nys-checkbox` elements.

declarations.description:
`<nys-datepicker>` is a form-associated, accessible date picker component.
Optionally wraps a `<wc-datepicker>` for custom calendar UI.

Events:
declarations.name: NysDatepicker

members.name: _setValue
members.description:
Form helper methods:
- _setValue: set internal value and trigger validation
- _manageRequire: handle required state
- _validate: actively validate and show errors
- checkValidity: passive boolean check without UI
- _setValidityMessage: sync validation message with UI and internals
- _handleInvalid: handle form invalid event and focus first invalid field

members.name: _validate
members.description:
Actively validates the component:
- Updates internal validity state
- Updates UI (e.g. showError)
- Called on blur/change or form submission

members.name: checkValidity
members.description:
Passive check of validity:
- Returns true/false
- Does NOT update UI or show errors
- Used in form submission checks

members.name: _replaceButtonSVG
members.description:
Replaces the default wc-datepicker month navigation buttons
with NYS icon components for previous and next month.

members.name: _isMobile
members.description:
Determines whether the current device uses a coarse pointer.
A coarse pointer usually means touch-based input where precise pointing
is not expected, such as fingers on phones and most tablets.

Note: This is not a guarantee of a mobile device.
Some non-mobile devices may also report a coarse pointer,
and some mobile devices may not.

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Dispatched when input or calendar loses focus

events.name: nys-input
events.description: Dispatched when user selects or types a valid date Notes: - Uses native date input on Safari or mobile devices (custom calendar removed for these scenarios)

declarations.description:
A horizontal rule for visual separation between content sections. Renders a semantic `<hr>` element.

Use to separate distinct content areas within a page. Set `inverted` for use on dark backgrounds.
declarations.name: NysDivider

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

declarations.summary: Horizontal divider for visual separation of content sections.

declarations.description:
**Internal component.** Displays error messages for form validation with icon and ARIA alert role.

Used internally by form components. Not intended for direct use. Shows error icon and message
when `showError` is true. Integrates with ElementInternals for native form validation messages.
declarations.name: NysErrorMessage

members.name: showError
members.description: Whether to display the error message.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error text to display. Falls back to native validation message if available.

members.name: showDivider
members.description: Shows a divider line above the error message.

attributes.name: showError
attributes.description: Whether to display the error message.

attributes.name: errorMessage
attributes.description: Error text to display. Falls back to native validation message if available.

attributes.name: showDivider
attributes.description: Shows a divider line above the error message.

declarations.summary: Internal error message display with icon and ARIA alert support.

declarations.description:
A file input for uploading files with support for multiple files, drag-and-drop, and progress tracking.
Validates file types via magic bytes (not just extension). Form-associated via ElementInternals.

Use for document uploads, image uploads, or any file submission. Enable `dropzone` for drag-and-drop UI.
declarations.name: NysFileinput

attributes.name: showError
attributes.description: Shows error message when true.

attributes.name: errorMessage
attributes.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

attributes.name: dropzone
attributes.description: Enables drag-and-drop zone UI.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Component width: `lg` (384px) or `full` (100%, default).

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

declarations.summary: File input with drag-and-drop, validation, and progress tracking.

declarations.description:
**Internal component.** Displays an individual file within `nys-fileinput` with status and progress.

Rendered automatically by `nys-fileinput` for each selected file. Shows filename, upload status
(pending/processing/done/error), progress bar during upload, and error messages. Remove button emits event.
declarations.name: NysFileItem

members.name: filename
members.description: Name of the file being displayed.

members.name: status
members.description: Upload status: `pending` (queued), `processing` (uploading), `done` (complete), `error` (failed).

members.name: progress
members.description: Upload progress percentage (0-100). Only shown when status is `processing`.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message displayed when status is `error`.

events.name: nys-fileRemove
events.description: Fired when remove button is clicked. Detail: `{filename}`.

attributes.name: filename
attributes.description: Name of the file being displayed.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Upload status: `pending` (queued), `processing` (uploading), `done` (complete), `error` (failed).

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: Upload progress percentage (0-100). Only shown when status is `processing`.

attributes.name: errorMessage
attributes.description: Error message displayed when status is `error`.

declarations.summary: Internal file item display with status, progress bar, and remove action.

declarations.description:
Agency-branded footer with agency name and slotted content sections. Auto-layouts based on content structure.

Place above `nys-unavfooter`. Slot contact info, links, or other content. Use `<h4>` elements
to create multi-column layouts; without `<h4>`, renders as compact single section.
declarations.name: NysGlobalFooter

slots.description: Footer content (links, contact info). Use `<h4>` for column headings.

members.name: agencyName
members.description: Agency name displayed as the footer heading.

members.name: homepageLink
members.description: URL for the agency name link. If empty, name is not clickable.

attributes.name: agencyName
attributes.description: Agency name displayed as the footer heading.

attributes.name: homepageLink
attributes.description: URL for the agency name link. If empty, name is not clickable.

declarations.summary: Agency footer with auto-layout for contact info and link sections.

declarations.description:
Agency-branded header with app/agency name, navigation, and responsive mobile menu.

Place below `nys-unavheader`. Slot navigation links as `<ul><li><a>` elements; active links
are auto-highlighted based on current URL. Mobile menu toggles automatically on narrow screens.
declarations.name: NysGlobalHeader

slots.description: Navigation content (typically `<ul>` with `<li><a>` links). Auto-sanitized.

members.name: appName
members.description: Application name displayed prominently.

members.name: agencyName
members.description: Agency name displayed below app name (or as main title if no appName).

members.name: homepageLink
members.description: URL for the header title link. If empty, title is not clickable.

attributes.name: appName
attributes.description: Application name displayed prominently.

attributes.name: agencyName
attributes.description: Agency name displayed below app name (or as main title if no appName).

attributes.name: homepageLink
attributes.description: URL for the header title link. If empty, title is not clickable.

declarations.summary: Agency header with navigation, mobile menu, and active link highlighting.

declarations.description:
Renders SVG icons from the NYSDS icon library (Material Symbols). Decorative by default (`aria-hidden`).

Pass `name` to select an icon from the library. Use `ariaLabel` to make the icon accessible
(removes `aria-hidden`). Supports size presets, rotation, flipping, and custom colors.
declarations.name: NysIcon

members.name: name
members.description: Icon name from Material Symbols library. Required.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.description: Accessible label. When set, removes `aria-hidden` and adds `aria-label` to the SVG.

members.name: rotate
members.description: Rotation in degrees. Applied via CSS `rotate`.

members.name: flip
members.description: Flip direction: `horizontal`, `vertical`, or empty for none.

members.name: color
members.description: Icon color. Accepts any CSS color value. Defaults to `currentcolor`.

members.name: size
members.description: Icon size. Semantic sizes: `xs`-`5xl`. Pixel sizes: `12`-`50`.

members.name: getIcon
members.description:
Retrieves the SVG element for the given icon name and applies
accessibility, rotation, flip, color, and size classes.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Icon name from Material Symbols library. Required.

attributes.name: ariaLabel
attributes.description: Accessible label. When set, removes `aria-hidden` and adds `aria-label` to the SVG.

attributes.name: rotate
attributes.description: Rotation in degrees. Applied via CSS `rotate`.

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description: Flip direction: `horizontal`, `vertical`, or empty for none.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Icon color. Accepts any CSS color value. Defaults to `currentcolor`.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Icon size. Semantic sizes: `xs`-`5xl`. Pixel sizes: `12`-`50`.

declarations.summary: SVG icon from Material Symbols library with size, rotation, and color options.

declarations.description:
**Internal component.** Renders form labels with description, required/optional flag, and tooltip.

Used internally by form components (textinput, select, checkbox, etc.). Not intended for direct use.
Handles label association via `for`, displays asterisk for required fields, and integrates tooltips.
declarations.name: NysLabel

slots.description: Custom HTML description content below the label.
slots.name: description

members.name: for
members.description: ID of the form element this label is associated with.

members.name: label
members.description: Label text displayed above the form field.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text displayed below the label.

members.name: flag
members.description: Flag type: `required` shows asterisk, `optional` shows "(Optional)".

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon next to label.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: ID of the form element this label is associated with.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label text displayed above the form field.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Helper text displayed below the label.

attributes.name: flag
attributes.description: Flag type: `required` shows asterisk, `optional` shows "(Optional)".

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon next to label.

declarations.summary: Internal label component for form fields with flag and tooltip support.

declarations.description:
An accessible modal dialog with focus trapping, keyboard navigation, and scroll management.

Set `open` to show the modal. Content goes in the default slot; action buttons in the `actions` slot.
Dismisses via close button or Escape key unless `mandatory` is set. Focus returns to trigger on close.
declarations.name: NysModal

slots.description: Default slot for body content.
Action buttons displayed in footer. Buttons auto-resize on mobile.
slots.name: actions

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: heading
members.description: Modal heading text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: subheading
members.description: Secondary heading below the main heading.

members.name: open
members.description: Controls modal visibility. Set to `true` to show.

members.name: mandatory
members.description: Prevents dismissal via close button or Escape key. User must take an action.

members.name: width
members.description: Modal width: `sm` (400px), `md` (600px), or `lg` (800px).

members.name: _updateDismissAria
members.description:
This exist to prevent the VO for dismiss button from announcing itself between the heading & subheading/slot content.
We add the "Close this window" ariaLabel after the initial VO is done

events.name: nys-open
events.description: Fired when modal opens. Detail: `{id}`.

events.name: nys-close
events.description: Fired when modal closes. Detail: `{id}`.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Modal heading text. Required for accessibility.

attributes.name: subheading
attributes.description: Secondary heading below the main heading.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Controls modal visibility. Set to `true` to show.

attributes.name: mandatory
attributes.description: Prevents dismissal via close button or Escape key. User must take an action.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Modal width: `sm` (400px), `md` (600px), or `lg` (800px).

declarations.summary: Accessible modal dialog with focus trap, keyboard support, and action slots.

declarations.description:
Page navigation with Previous/Next buttons and numbered page links. Auto-collapses with ellipses for many pages.

Set `totalPages` and `currentPage` to control state. Listen to `nys-change` for page selection.
Hidden automatically when `totalPages` is 1. Responsive: shows compact controls on mobile.
declarations.name: NysPagination

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name attribute for form association.

members.name: currentPage
members.description: Currently active page (1-indexed). Clamped to valid range.

members.name: totalPages
members.description: Total number of pages. Must be at least 1.

members.name: _twoBeforeLast
members.description: Internal state for layout adjustments near the end.

events.name: nys-change
events.description: Fired when page changes. Detail: `{page}`.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for form association.

attributes.name: currentPage
attributes.description: Currently active page (1-indexed). Clamped to valid range.

attributes.name: totalPages
attributes.description: Total number of pages. Must be at least 1.

attributes.name: _twoBeforeLast
attributes.description: Internal state for layout adjustments near the end.

declarations.summary: Page navigation with numbered links, prev/next buttons, and responsive layout.

declarations.description:
A radio button for single selection within a `nys-radiogroup`. Only one radio with the same `name` can be selected.

Use within `nys-radiogroup` for 2-6 mutually exclusive options. For 7+ options, use `nys-select`.
For multiple selections, use `nys-checkbox`.
declarations.name: NysRadiobutton

slots.description: Custom HTML description content.
slots.name: description

members.name: checked
members.description: Whether this radio is selected. Only one per group can be checked.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks group as required. Set on radiogroup, not individual radios.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Group name. Radios with same name are mutually exclusive.

members.name: value
members.description: Value submitted when this radio is selected.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with.

members.name: size
members.description: Radio size: `sm` (24px) or `md` (32px, default).

members.name: tile
members.description: Renders as tile with larger clickable area.

events.name: nys-change
events.description: Fired when selection changes. Detail: `{id, checked, name, value}`.

events.name: nys-focus
events.description: Fired when radio gains focus.

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Fired when radio loses focus.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Whether this radio is selected. Only one per group can be checked.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Prevents interaction.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Marks group as required. Set on radiogroup, not individual radios.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Group name. Radios with same name are mutually exclusive.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value submitted when this radio is selected.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: Form `id` to associate with.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Radio size: `sm` (24px) or `md` (32px, default).

attributes.name: tile
attributes.description: Renders as tile with larger clickable area.

declarations.summary: Radio button for single selection from mutually exclusive options.

declarations.description:
A container for grouping `nys-radiobutton` elements as a single form control with enforced single selection.
Handles keyboard navigation (arrow keys), validation, required constraints, and form integration.

Use to let users select exactly one option from 2-6 choices. Apply `tile`, `size`, and `inverted` to the group
and all children inherit these styles automatically. For 7+ options, use `nys-select`.
declarations.name: NysRadiogroup

slots.description: Default slot for `nys-radiobutton` elements.
Custom HTML description content.
slots.name: description

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission. Auto-populated from child radiobuttons.

members.name: required
members.description: Requires a selection before form submission.

members.name: optional
members.description: Shows "Optional" flag.

members.name: showError
members.description: Shows error message when true.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text for the group.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: tile
members.description: Renders all radiobuttons as tiles with larger clickable area.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds. Applied to all children.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with. Applied to all children.

members.name: size
members.description: Radio size for all children: `sm` (24px) or `md` (32px, default).

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name for form submission. Auto-populated from child radiobuttons.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Requires a selection before form submission.

attributes.name: optional
attributes.description: Shows "Optional" flag.

attributes.name: showError
attributes.description: Shows error message when true.

attributes.name: errorMessage
attributes.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Visible label text for the group.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

attributes.name: tile
attributes.description: Renders all radiobuttons as tiles with larger clickable area.

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds. Applied to all children.

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: Form `id` to associate with. Applied to all children.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Radio size for all children: `sm` (24px) or `md` (32px, default).

declarations.summary: Container for grouping radio buttons as a single form control.

declarations.description:
An option item for use within `nys-select`. Wraps a native `<option>` element.

Place inside `nys-select`. Set `value` for form submission and `label` for display text.
Alternatively, slot text content which auto-populates the label.
declarations.name: NysOption

slots.description: Option label text. Auto-populates the `label` prop if provided.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents selection of this option.

members.name: selected
members.description: Pre-selects this option.

members.name: value
members.description: Value submitted when this option is selected.

members.name: label
members.description: Display text for the option. Auto-populated from slot content if not set.

members.name: hidden
members.description: Hides the option from the dropdown list.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Prevents selection of this option.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Pre-selects this option.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value submitted when this option is selected.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Display text for the option. Auto-populated from slot content if not set.

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: Hides the option from the dropdown list.

declarations.summary: Option item for nys-select dropdown.

declarations.description:
A dropdown for selecting a single option from a list. Supports native `<option>` and `<optgroup>` elements.
Form-associated with validation via ElementInternals.

Use when users must choose one option from 7+ items. For fewer options, consider `nys-radiobutton`.
For multiple selections, use `nys-checkbox` group instead.
declarations.name: NysSelect

slots.description: Default slot for `<option>` and `<optgroup>` elements.
Custom HTML description content below the label.
slots.name: description

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: value
members.description: Currently selected option value.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks as required. Shows "Required" flag and validates on blur.

members.name: optional
members.description: Shows "Optional" flag. Use when most fields are required.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with when select is outside form element.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: showError
members.description: Shows error message when true. Set by validation or manually.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

members.name: width
members.description: Select width: `sm` (88px), `md` (200px), `lg` (384px), `full` (100%, default).

events.name: nys-focus

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Fired when select loses focus. Triggers validation.

attributes.description: Name for form submission.

declarations.summary: Dropdown select for choosing one option from a list.

declarations.description:
An accessible "Skip to main content" link for keyboard and screen reader users. Visually hidden until focused.

Place as the first focusable element in the document. Links to `#main-content` by default, or specify `href`
for a custom target. The target element receives focus when activated for proper screen reader announcement.
declarations.name: NysSkipnav

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: href
members.description: Target element ID (with `#`). Defaults to `#main-content`.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Target element ID (with `#`). Defaults to `#main-content`.

declarations.summary: Skip navigation link for keyboard accessibility. Hidden until focused.

declarations.description:
A single step within `nys-stepper`. Represents one stage in a multi-step process.

Mark as `current` to indicate active progress point. Previous steps become clickable for navigation.
Set `href` for page-based navigation or listen to `nys-step-click` for SPA routing.
declarations.name: NysStep

members.name: selected
members.description: Whether this step is currently being viewed. Set by parent stepper.

members.name: current
members.description: Marks the furthest reached step. Steps before this are navigable.

members.name: label
members.description: Step label text displayed alongside the step number.

members.name: href
members.description: URL for page navigation when step is clicked. Optional for SPA routing.

members.name: isCompactExpanded
members.description: Internal: Whether parent stepper's compact view is expanded.

members.name: onClick
members.description: Custom click handler. Called before `nys-step-click` event.

members.name: stepNumber
members.description: Step number (1-indexed). Auto-assigned by parent stepper.

events.description: Fired when a navigable step is clicked. Detail: `{href, label}`. Cancelable.
events.name: nys-step-click

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Whether this step is currently being viewed. Set by parent stepper.

attributes.name: current
attributes.description: Marks the furthest reached step. Steps before this are navigable.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Step label text displayed alongside the step number.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: URL for page navigation when step is clicked. Optional for SPA routing.

attributes.name: isCompactExpanded
attributes.description: Internal: Whether parent stepper's compact view is expanded.

attributes.name: stepNumber
attributes.description: Step number (1-indexed). Auto-assigned by parent stepper.

declarations.summary: Individual step for use within nys-stepper with navigation support.

declarations.description:
A multi-step progress indicator for forms or wizards. Manages `nys-step` children with selection and navigation.

Add `nys-step` elements as children. Mark one step as `current` to indicate progress; previous steps become
navigable. Compact view on mobile expands to show all steps. Use `actions` slot for navigation buttons.
declarations.name: NysStepper

slots.description: Default slot for `nys-step` elements.
Navigation buttons (e.g., Back, Continue). Must be wrapped in a `<div>`.
slots.name: actions

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier.

members.name: name
members.description: Name attribute for form association.

members.name: label
members.description: Title displayed above the step counter.

members.name: counterText
members.description: Progress text (e.g., "Step 2 of 5"). Auto-updated based on selection.

members.name: isCompactExpanded
members.description: Whether compact mobile view is expanded to show all steps.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for form association.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Title displayed above the step counter.

attributes.name: counterText
attributes.description: Progress text (e.g., "Step 2 of 5"). Auto-updated based on selection.

attributes.name: isCompactExpanded
attributes.description: Whether compact mobile view is expanded to show all steps.

declarations.summary: Multi-step progress indicator with navigation and mobile-friendly compact view.

declarations.description:
`<nys-table>` is a responsive table component that can display native HTML tables,
supports striped and bordered styling, sortable columns, and CSV download.
declarations.name: NysTable

slots.description: Accepts a `<table>` element. Only the first table is rendered.

events.description: Fired when the download button or sortable headers are clicked.
events.name: nys-click

declarations.description:
A multi-line text input for collecting longer responses like comments, descriptions, or feedback.
Form-associated with validation support via ElementInternals.

Use for detailed responses needing multiple lines. For single-line input, use `nys-textinput`.
For predefined options, use `nys-select`, `nys-radiobutton`, or `nys-checkbox`.
declarations.name: NysTextarea

slots.description: Custom HTML description content below the label.
slots.name: description

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text. Don't use as label replacement.

members.name: value
members.description: Current textarea value.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: readonly
members.description: Makes textarea read-only but focusable.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks as required. Shows "Required" flag and validates on blur.

members.name: optional
members.description: Shows "Optional" flag. Use when most fields are required.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with when textarea is outside form element.

members.name: maxlength
members.description: Maximum character length.

members.name: width
members.description: Textarea width: `sm` (88px), `md` (200px), `lg` (384px), `full` (100%, default).

members.name: rows
members.description: Visible height in lines.

members.name: resize
members.description: Resize behavior: `vertical` (default, user can resize height), `none` (fixed size).

members.name: showError
members.description: Shows error message when true. Set by validation or manually.

members.name: errorMessage

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: Form `id` to associate with when textarea is outside form element.

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Maximum character length.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Textarea width: `sm` (88px), `md` (200px), `lg` (384px), `full` (100%, default).

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Visible height in lines.

attributes.name: resize
attributes.description: Resize behavior: `vertical` (default, user can resize height), `none` (fixed size).

attributes.name: showError
attributes.description: Shows error message when true. Set by validation or manually.

attributes.name: errorMessage
attributes.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

declarations.summary: Multi-line text input for comments, descriptions, and feedback.

declarations.description:
A text input for collecting short, single-line data. Supports validation, input masking (tel),
password visibility toggle, and live error messaging. Form-associated via ElementInternals.

Use for names, emails, passwords, phone numbers. For multi-line input, use `nys-textarea` instead.
For predefined options, use `nys-select`, `nys-radiobutton`, or `nys-checkbox`.
declarations.name: NysTextinput

slots.description: Custom HTML description content below the label.
slots.name: description

slots.description: Button at input start. Use single `nys-button` only.
slots.name: startButton

slots.description: Button at input end. Use single `nys-button` only.
slots.name: endButton

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission.

members.name: type
members.description: Input type: `text` (default), `email`, `number`, `password`, `search`, `tel` (auto-masked), `url`.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text. Required for accessibility.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text. Don't use as label replacement.

members.name: value
members.description: Current input value.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: readonly
members.description: Makes input read-only but focusable.

members.name: required
members.description: Marks as required. Shows "Required" flag and validates on blur.

members.name: optional
members.description: Shows "Optional" flag. Use when most fields are required.

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Tooltip text shown on hover/focus of info icon.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with when input is outside form element.

members.name: pattern
members.description: Regex pattern for validation. Shows error on mismatch.

members.name: maxlength
members.description: Maximum character length.

members.name: width
members.description: Input width: `sm` (88px), `md` (200px), `lg` (384px), `full` (100%, default).

members.name: step
members.description: Step increment for `type="number"`.

members.name: min
members.description: Minimum value for `type="number"`.

members.name: max
members.description: Maximum value for `type="number"`.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: showError
members.description: Shows error message when true. Set by validation or manually.

members.name: errorMessage
members.description: Error message text. Shown only when `showError` is true.

events.name: nys-input
events.description: Fired on input change. Detail: `{id, value}`.

events.name: nys-focus
events.description: Fired when input gains focus.

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Fired when input loses focus. Triggers validation.

declarations.summary: Text input for short single-line data with validation and masking support.

declarations.description:
A toggle switch for binary settings with immediate effect. Form-associated via ElementInternals.

Use when changing a setting takes effect immediately (e.g., dark mode, notifications).
For binary choices in forms that submit later, use `nys-checkbox` instead.
declarations.name: NysToggle

slots.description: Custom HTML description content.
slots.name: description

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: name
members.description: Name for form submission.

members.name: value
members.description: Value submitted when toggle is on.

members.name: label
members.description: Visible label text.

members.name: description
members.description: Helper text below label. Use slot for custom HTML.

members.name: form
members.description: Form `id` to associate with.

members.name: checked
members.description: Whether toggle is on.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Prevents interaction.

members.name: noIcon
members.description: Hides check/close icon inside toggle knob.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: size
members.description: Toggle size: `sm` or `md` (default).

events.name: nys-change
events.description: Fired when toggle state changes. Detail: `{id, checked}`.

events.name: nys-focus
events.description: Fired when toggle gains focus.

events.name: nys-blur
events.description: Fired when toggle loses focus.

declarations.summary: Toggle switch for binary settings with immediate effect.

declarations.description:
Shows contextual help text on hover/focus. Auto-positions to stay within viewport and supports keyboard dismiss.

Link to a trigger element via `for` attribute matching the trigger's `id`. Tooltip appears on hover or focus
and dismisses on blur, mouse leave, or Escape key. Use for supplementary info onlynot critical content.
declarations.name: NysTooltip

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

members.name: text
members.description: Tooltip content text. Required.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

members.name: for
members.description: ID of the trigger element to attach this tooltip to. Required.

members.name: position
members.description: Preferred position relative to trigger. Auto-adjusts if space is insufficient.

members.name: _applyTooltipPropToFormComponent
members.description:
In React, the reference element found is often the native HTML element within the nys-component.
Therefore, this function accounts for the closest NYS component ancestor that supports a tooltip prop.

members.name: _doesPositionFit
members.description:
Checks if the tooltip fits inside the viewport on the given side of the trigger.
Used for auto-positioning. Ignores text overflow for now.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier. Auto-generated if not provided.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Tooltip content text. Required.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Adjusts colors for dark backgrounds.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: ID of the trigger element to attach this tooltip to. Required.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Preferred position relative to trigger. Auto-adjusts if space is insufficient.

declarations.summary: Contextual tooltip with auto-positioning, keyboard support, and screen reader integration.

declarations.description:
Universal NYS footer with logo and statewide navigation links. Required on all NYS sites.

Place as the last element before `</body>`. Displays NY.gov logo and links to Agencies,
App Directory, Counties, Events, Programs, and Services. No configuration needed.
declarations.name: NysUnavFooter
declarations.summary: Universal NYS footer with logo and statewide links. Required site-wide.

declarations.description:
Universal NYS header with trust bar, logo, search, and language translation. Required on all NYS sites.

Place as the first element in `<body>`. Includes "official site" trust indicator, NY.gov logo,
site search (searches ny.gov), and 14-language translation dropdown. Use `hideSearch` or `hideTranslate`
to remove features if not applicable.
declarations.name: NysUnavHeader

members.name: trustbarVisible
members.description: Internal: Whether trust bar panel is expanded.

members.name: searchDropdownVisible
members.description: Internal: Whether search dropdown is visible (mobile).

members.name: languageVisible
members.description: Internal: Whether language dropdown is visible.

members.name: isSearchFocused
members.description: Internal: Whether search input is focused.

members.name: hideTranslate
members.description: Hides the translation dropdown.

members.name: hideSearch
members.description: Hides the search functionality.

attributes.name: trustbarVisible
attributes.description: Internal: Whether trust bar panel is expanded.

attributes.name: searchDropdownVisible
attributes.description: Internal: Whether search dropdown is visible (mobile).

attributes.name: languageVisible
attributes.description: Internal: Whether language dropdown is visible.

attributes.name: isSearchFocused
attributes.description: Internal: Whether search input is focused.

attributes.name: hideTranslate
attributes.description: Hides the translation dropdown.

attributes.name: hideSearch
attributes.description: Hides the search functionality.

declarations.summary: Universal NYS header with trust bar, search, and translation. Required site-wide.
